about_desc: I am a Full-Stack Developer based in Turkey and a graduate of Software Engineering from Fırat University. I'm passionate about building clean, efficient, and scalable web applications. I work actively in both frontend and backend development. I specialize in technologies like Vue.js, ASP.NET, and Node.js, and I'm proficient in C#, JavaScript, TypeScript, and Python. I also have experience with modern databases such as PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and MySQL. I continuously follow new technologies, contribute to open-source projects on GitHub, and work on personal projects to sharpen my skills. I enjoy developing full-stack applications that solve real-world problems and deliver excellent user experiences.
footer_desc: Thank you for visiting my personal portfolio. You can contact me via social media.
